meanings.definition: The process of causing something to absorb water.
meanings.sent1: Proper hydration is important for your health.
meanings.sent2: After a long run, I always make sure to drink enough water for hydration.
meanings.sent3: The thirsty plant eagerly awaited its hydration from the rain.
meanings.sent4: The hydration of the sponge was evident as it swelled up with water.
meanings.sent5: His skin showed signs of dehydration, highlighting the importance of hydration.

meanings.definition: The state of being well hydrated.
meanings.sent1: She felt great thanks to her hydration after drinking plenty of water.
meanings.sent2: Athletes need to maintain proper hydration to perform at their best.
meanings.sent3: The hydration of the team was evident in their energetic performance.
meanings.sent4: Her glowing skin was a clear indication of her good hydration levels.
meanings.sent5: The hydration of the soil was crucial for the healthy growth of the plants.
